title._content: Baptist Church Bell, Court Street, Keene NH

description._content: TITLE Baptist ChurchBell , Court Street, Keene NH CREATOR SUBJECT Churches - NH - Keene Baptist churches - NH - Keene Bells DESCRIPTION Photograph of the Bell hanging in the Baptist Church on Court Street in Keene New Hampshire. The church was dedicated in 1875 and dismantled in 1968. The Bell was cast by Paul Revere of Boston. It was first hung in the Ash Swamp Meetinghouse which was built in 1816. It then hung in the Baptist Church on Winter Street, built in 1842. It was installed in 1874 in the Baptist Church on Court Street. As of 1974, it was in the possession of the First Baptist Church on Maple Avenue. PUBLISHER Keene Public Library DATE DIGITAL 20071130 DATE ORIGINAL 1921? RESOURCE TYPE photographic postcards FORMAT image/jpg RESOURCE IDENTIFIER hsykcrh020 RIGHTS MANAGMENT No known restriction on publication.
